answers.author: Maher Hazine
answers.text:
Public Works covers Large areas of Operations. Each has specific information. What areas are looking for (Streets, Solid Waste, Facilities, Fleet, Water, Wastewater).
Thanks

answers.author: Michael Repas
answers.text:
Hi David:
I have found several examples for you, and posted them to the Knowledge Network for ease of access:
-Safety Manual from Flagstaff, AZ: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301429/Flagstaff_AZ_Public_Works_Safety_Manual
-Wastewater Treatment Plant Policy from Anacortes, WA: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301431/Wastewater_Treatment_Plant_Policy__Anacortes_WA
-Department of Public Works Safety Manual from Allegheny County, PA: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301432/Allegheny_County_PA__Department_of_Public_Works_Safety_Manual
Finally, here is an article from the Village of Rockville Center, NY: http://icma.org/en/Article/100412/Workplace_Safety
I hope this helps!


Hi David:

I have found several examples for you, and posted them to the Knowledge Network for ease of access:
-Safety Manual from Flagstaff, AZ: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301429/Flagstaff_AZ_Public_Works_Safety_Manual

-Wastewater Treatment Plant Policy from Anacortes, WA: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301431/Wastewater_Treatment_Plant_Policy__Anacortes_WA

-Department of Public Works Safety Manual from Allegheny County, PA: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301432/Allegheny_County_PA__Department_of_Public_Works_Safety_Manual

Finally, here is an article from the Village of Rockville Center, NY: http://icma.org/en/Article/100412/Workplace_Safety

I hope this helps!

author: David Dillner
text:
Does anyone have a safety manual specifically for Public Works?
Thanks.
title: Public Works Safety Manual
